phrases: If you do not resist, I can make your death painless.
Why are you doing this?
That is a cliche, but do you mind my asking?
If someone seems suspicious, punish them.
This is the rule of maids.
Does Ram know?
I intend to finish this before my sister sees anything.
Is that how little you trusted me?
Yes.
Damn, I am pathetic...
I was so sure we were getting along well.
My sister
I do not want to hear it!
Take this!
My leg!
Mana of water, heal this damaged body.
If you die so easily,
I cannot get any information from you.
If you had stabbed me with this,
you could have fled a bit farther.
I ask you this...
Are you a member of the faction that supports Emilia-sama's rival for the throne?
My heart belongs to Emilia-tan forever
Who hired you, and under what conditions?
Emilia-tan's smile, and it was priceless
Are you affiliated with the witch's cult?
The witch's cult?
I do not know what that is...
My family has been secular for generations
Do not play dumb!
Your bald-faced lies can only take you so far,
when the witch's smell lies thickly upon you!
When I watched you conversing with my sister,
I felt I would go mad with anger and unrest.
Someone associated with the one who has caused my sister so much agony,
boldly encroaching on the place in which she and I belong...
I cannot bear it any longer.
Even if I know my sister only acts friendly with, and pretends to care for, you!
I do not cut my hands when I peel vegetables anymore.
I can read and write now, even if it is just the simple stuff.
I kept my word and studied.
I was able to read those fairy tales.
Thanks to you two...
What are you talking about?
I am talking about the things you guys gave me.
I have no memory of any of that.
Why do not you remember?!
Why do you all keep leaving me behind?
What did I do to you?
What am I supposed to do?
What did I do wrong?
Why do you guys hate me so much?
Even when you said you would cut my hair...
All that time, I...
I really like both of y
My sister is too kind.
Sir, have you awakened?
Sir, you are awake?
Subaru, Ram and Rem were really worried.
They were unusually despondent, wondering if they would been impolite...
Nothing happened between them and me.
Subaru, are you all right?
If something is wrong,
If I could tell Emilia that it is no use, that I cannot take any more...
That is it.
What?
All this time, I have been struggling to change things alone, but...
Subaru, are you sure you are all right?
There is something I want you to know.
Okay.
Emilia...
Several times up till now, I have died.
Whoa...
Wait.
This is seriously no joke...
Subaru?
Subaru!
What happened, all of a sudden?
My body moves.
My voice works.
My heart does not hurt.
But...
The fear is engraved in me...
What is wrong?
You have been acting really strange.
Subaru, if something is going on
I have a favor to ask.
Okay.
Have nothing to do with me.
I cannot tell anyone about Return by Death.
I have died in this mansion three times.
In the capital, I did not experience a fourth time.
If I die again,
I might not come back.
That is quite a cowardly look on your face, I suppose.
Why are you here?
The brat and Bubby told me to come and check on you.
Puck and Emilia?
Since you were acting strangely,
they suspected I did something to you when you first woke up, I suppose.
Talk about rude!
I get it.
I am okay now.
You came to apologize.
That is enough.
Why should I apologize to you, I suppose?
I cannot leave until I correct that notion.
Not only do you look gloomy,
but the smell is much heavier now, too.
Huh?
The smell of the witch.
I feel it is bending my nose, I suppose.
Witch...
You mean the Jealous Witch?
What else in the world would someone mean when they bring up a witch?
Why do you smell her on me?
Who knows?
Regardless, as someone who receives special treatment from her,
you are a burden.
It is not too comforting to hear
I am getting special treatment from someone whose name and face I do not know.
If you have nothing to say, I am leaving.
I will tell Bubby what you told me, I suppose.
Wait a minute...
You feel sorry for what you did to me, right?
I do not.
I am telling Puck!
Well, I might feel just a tiny bit sorry, I suppose.
If you regret what you did and want my forgiveness,
do me one favor that I ask.
Let us hear it.
On the fifth morning,
the day after tomorrow...
Would you keep me safe until then?
I do not want you to bring dissension into this mansion, I suppose.
This place is vitally important to me.
I have no intention of doing anything.
I just want to stop any sparks from flying.
What an admirable motive
for one who leaves even that in the hands of others.
For once, I have no response to that...
Hold out your hand.
I shall grant your wish.
I, Beatrice, on my honor, am henceforth bound by this contract.
Temporary or not, a contract is a contract.
I will grant your nonsense favor.
Seriously?
I am going to cry because of a little girl...
Do not call me a little girl!
And if you tell Bubby, you will regret it, I suppose!
Hmph!
It is that important to you?
That desperation of yours is fanatical like a demon.
Stop!
You cannot keep sleeping forever, I suppose.
Bombardier!
I came against my will because it is the designated time,
yet you seem awfully unconcerned.
Falling asleep on the fourth day,
what kind of reckless idiot am I?
Quit your grumbling, I suppose.
Just sit wherever you want.
The forbidden archive?
Did you carry me in here while I slept?
I would rather not stay in that room filled with your stench, I suppose.
The forbidden library is the only place for me.
You need to observe proper manners, I suppose.
Beatrice, I am sure I am wrong,
but you did not hold my hand while I was asleep, did you?
You are wrong, indeed.
Even if Bubby asked me to, I would refuse, I suppose.
Flat-out denial, huh?
I am not sure what you mean by proper manners...
So, hey, are you
You are annoying me with all your questions!
Just be quiet, I suppose.
Calling.
Huh?
I have been summoned, I suppose.
Oh, right, you are here.
I forgot, I suppose.
H-Hey, hold on!
If you go out there now...
I do not care if you want to stay here.
You will be safe here, I suppose.
Damn it!
What the hell is this?
Did I
make it through the fourth night?
And I thought it was so far away.
It was that easy...
Subaru?
Emilia?
Subaru, where have you been?
Oh, I was just...
You know...
No, never mind.
Come with me.
Huh?
Where are we going?
Emilia-tan?
Why are you making that face?
Everything will be fine now.
Right?
I am alive, and you are...
Oh, I know!
Let us go to the village!
There is so much I want to do and tell you!
So much has happened!
Subaru...
Emilia?
How...
Why is Rem dead?
Do not touch her!
Do not touch Rem...
Do not touch my little sister!
She died of weakness.
It was as if she merely fell asleep.
The method was more of a curse than a spell.
I thought it was Rem who used that curse.
So Rem is not the shaman?
My dear guest, have you any idea what might have occurred?
After this has happened to a dear member of my staff,
I seem to be a little bit angry.
Subaru,
if you know anything, tell us.
I want to spill it all and get it off my chest.
Ow!
If you know something, spill it all!
Wait, Ram!
That is...
I keep my promises.
As long as he remains in this mansion,
I am contracted to protect him, I suppose.
Beatrice-sama?
Roswaal, he spent last night in the forbidden library, I suppose.
So he surely had nothing to do with
There is no further need to emphasize the situation at hand.
However, to guard him with your life,
you must have taken quite a liking to him.
Save the jokes for your makeup and weird fetishes, I suppose.
None of that even matters!
Get out of the way.
Let me through.
I must avenge Rem.
If you know anything, tell me.
Help me.
Help Rem!
I am sorry, Ram.
Despite all this,
I choose to trust Subaru.
Subaru, please.
If you can save Ram...
If you can save Rem,
please do.
I am sorry.
Subaru!
I am going to kill you!
I ran.
I ran away.
I ran away from them.
I cannot go back there again.
What choice did I have?
What could I...
And I was
having so much fun!
This looks like the place where I died.
Where I died?
If I die...
Will I be saved from this whole situation?
Of course...
If I die, everything will change.
If I struggled and fought so much, only to end up here,
then what is the point?
The cliff...
If I close my eyes and take one step, it will all be over.
What will happen to me if I die again?
It is just one more step...
I cannot even...
I cannot even do something so simple.
I finally found you.
Why...
What, I suppose?
Why did you come for me?
The contract I entered into was to protect you.
I thought you were only supposed to be my bodyguard until this morning.
You must be mistaken, I suppose.
I do not remember discussing a time limit.
Clinging to hope only serves your own convenience, I suppose.
What was lost cannot be reclaimed.
You will have no more chances to explain yourself to the older sister.
You threw that away.
No matter which is lost, those sisters will not ever be complete again, I suppose.
But I cared about those two,
and I wanted to protect them!
What do you know about them, I suppose?
No matter which is lost, they will not be restored to what they were.
They cannot be.
So in the end,
I was just making a selfish, disgraceful fuss, not knowing anything?
At the least,
you need to die where I cannot see you, or I will have bad dreams, I suppose.
So I will help you escape this domain.
Come to think of it, back then,
someone was holding both my hands.
Ram... Rem...
If they could not bear to see me suffer,
and held both my hands...
If that was the kind of people they are,
how can I leave them?
I am going to kill you!
I heard a voice filled with hatred.
But more than that...
Her cries will not leave my mind.
I have always been the type to drift toward whichever path was easiest.
Hey, Subaru, you are thinking about something pretty stupid.
And after I managed to save this life...
That is right.
I saved my life, so...
What is wrong with taking the path that is easiest, that will let me live longer?
I will decide how I use my life!
You were too slow.
I finally found you.
I will not let you get away.
Stay back, I suppose.
As long as my contract exists,
I will not hold back, not even against you.
And you, Beatrice-sama, seem to forget that we are not in the mansion now.
We are in the forest, away from the forbidden library.
Are you certain you can protect him from me?
Boing!
Oh, yeah, that feels good!
Wh-Wh-Wh-What are you doing?!
D-Do you want to die?!
Do not be dumb.
I do not want to die in the slightest.
I am fine with dying just once, at the end of a long life.
That is how I really feel.
You have guts.
You finally accept your fate?
I would not call it that.
If anything,
I would say I have made up my mind.
Sorry...
I caused a lot of grief for you guys by being such a loser.
You really do know something about Rem?
No, sorry, but I honestly do not know a thing.
Frankly, there is too much I do not know.
But...
I decided to learn more about the things I do not know.
How can you say that now?
Rem is already dead.
What can you do by learning anything now?!
I will not make any cool statements about what I will be able to do.
After all, this is what happened when I could not do anything...
I know better than anyone that my words are not convincing in the least.
But I do remember...
I know parts of you two that you have forgotten!
What do you know about Rem and me?!
You are right.
I do not know anything that is really important.
But you do not know, either, do you?!
Know what?
That I love you guys!
Wait!
This is something only I can do!
I am going to kill you!
I am going to save you!
Natsuki Subaru's Re start
